title: AI-Enhanced Full Stack Developer Roadmap

nodes.title: HTML5 & Semantic Web
nodes.description: The skeleton of the web. Understanding accessibility and SEO-friendly structures.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on semantic tags (article, section, nav) and ARIA labels. Skip: Legacy table layouts and archaic frame tags.

nodes.title: Modern CSS & Tailwind CSS
nodes.description: Moving away from vanilla CSS to utility-first styling for rapid prototyping.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on Flexbox and Grid for layout. Learn Tailwind CSS classes. Skip: CSS floats, Bootstrap, and heavy animation libraries like Framer Motion for now.

phases.title: Phase 1: Modern Frontend Foundations
phases.description: Mastering the structure and styling of the web with a focus on modern layouts and responsive design.

nodes.title: Modern JavaScript (ES6+)
nodes.description: Core JS concepts required for modern frameworks like React.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on Arrow Functions, Map/Filter/Reduce, and Fetch API. Skip: var (use let/const), JQuery, and Prototypes (Classes are enough for now).

nodes.title: React.js Ecosystem
nodes.description: The industry standard for building dynamic user interfaces.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on useEffect, useState, and custom hooks. Skip: Class Components and Redux (it's overkill for most modern projects).

phases.title: Phase 2: JavaScript Mastery for Python Developers
phases.description: Bridging the gap between Python logic and JavaScript's event-driven nature.

nodes.title: FastAPI & Pydantic
nodes.description: Modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on Type Hinting and Automatic Documentation (Swagger). Skip: Flask (too thin) and Django (too monolithic for now).

nodes.title: SQL Databases & ORMs
nodes.description: Data persistence using PostgreSQL and SQLAlchemy.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on Relationships (One-to-Many), Joins, and Indexing. Skip: NoSQL (MongoDB) unless you have a specific use case; SQL is more standard.

phases.title: Phase 3: Pythonic Backend & Databases
phases.description: Leveraging your Python skills to build high-performance APIs.

nodes.title: LangChain & AI Agents in Web Apps
nodes.description: Building full-stack AI features like RAG or Agentic workflows.
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on Server-Sent Events (SSE) for streaming AI chat. Skip: Building models from scratch (use APIs).

nodes.title: Docker & Cloud Deployment
nodes.specific_focus: Focus on Multi-stage Docker builds. Skip: Kubernetes (too complex for individual developers).

phases.title: Phase 4: AI Integration & Deployment
phases.description: The 'Full Stack AI' niche. Connecting your LLM expertise to your web apps.

description: A tailored path for a professional with Python/ML background to master modern full-stack development, leveraging existing logic and AI expertise.
